TopicTitle: Welcome to KSP Forum! - Some KSP Forum tips

Articles.Content:
If you are new to KSP Forum, welcome to KSP Forum!

Here are some tips to use KSP Forum:

You need to check KSP Forum Rules before you use KSP Forum. If you violate to many rules it's possible for your account to be permanently. You do have infractions to see how many rules you have violated.

KSP Forum Rules

Tips:

- Just in case, to add a link to your post, first copy the link that you want to go to, click the earth (or Kerbin) with the pin in front of it (be sure not to click the earth/Kerbin with the pin and the X in front of it), and right click, and click paste.

- To edit your post (such as, you didn't spell a word right), click "Edit".

- To edit advanced (such as, to show/disable your signature and edit your title and more), click "Go Advanced".

- To delete your post, click "Edit", "Delete", check the box "Delete Message".

- To customize your profile, go to "My Profile" on the top right of the page, click "Customize My Profile".

- To edit almost anything go under "Forum Actions", click "Edit Profile".

- To reply with a quote, on the post that you want to reply to, click "Reply With Quote".

- Do you not want to be replaced with a smile face, if you start a thread, click "Disable smiles in text". If you are posting a reply to a thread, click "Edit", "Go Advanced", "Disable smiles in text".

Quick Tip: To make a thread, you must add a prefix. If a prefix doesn't show up, you don't need one.

Quick Tip #2: Infractions can be found in your profile (to go to your profile, on the top of the page, click "My Profile").

If this didn't help, private message by clicking HERE

Please tell how much this helped or if it helped at all or to ask me some different questions about how to do stuff on KSP Forum etc. in the comments (you do not have to private message)

Post in the comments below or private message by clicking the link "HERE" above.

Edited February 3, 2015 by CDK
